actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Hatch. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Domenici without recommendation without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 730.

official_title: An original resolution waiving section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S.1889.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 1889 (United States Academy of Peace).

titles.title: An original resolution waiving section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S.1889.
